confirmRequeue.label: Requeuing a node
confirmRequeue.tooltip: Controls if a confirmation is needed for requeuing a node.

confirmRequeueAborted.label: Requeuing an aborted suite or family
confirmRequeueAborted.tooltip: Controls if a confirmation is needed for requeuing an aborted suite or family.

confirmSetComplete.label: Setting a task or alias to COMPLETE
confirmSetComplete.tooltip: Controls if a confirmation is needed for setting a task or alias to COMPLETE.

confirmSetAborted.label: Setting a task or alias to ABORTED
confirmSetAborted.tooltip: Controls if a confirmation is needed for setting a task or alias to ABORTED.

confirmForceComplete.label: Forcing a node to COMPLETE
confirmForceComplete.tooltip: Controls if a confirmation is needed for forcing a node COMPLETE.

confirmForceAborted.label: Forcing a node to ABORTED
confirmForceAborted.tooltip: Controls if a confirmation is needed for forcing a node to ABORTED.

confirmKillTask.label: Killing a task or alias
confirmKillTask.tooltip: Controls if a confirmation is needed for killing a task or alias.

confirmKillSuite.label: Killing a suite or family
confirmKillSuite.tooltip: Controls if a confirmation is needed for killing a suite or family.
